Welcome to Battleship

Instructions

The game is played against the Computer.

You can begin by positioning your ships on the board, to do that, hover over your board,
choose the best direction for your ship and add it to the board by a simple click.

  • Position not allowed
  • Position allowed
  • Ship well added

Once all your ships are positioned,
you can start playing by clicking computer board on the right hand.
